problem: 如图,市政府准备修建一座高AB为6m的过街天桥,已知∠ACB为天桥的坡面AC与地面BC的夹角,且sin∠ACB=\frac{3}{5},则坡面AC的长度为()
comment: 此题主要考查了解直角三角形的应用,正确应用锐角三角函数关系是解题关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the city government is preparing to build an overpass with a height AB of N_0. It is known that ∠ACB is the angle between the slope AC of the overpass and the ground BC, and sin∠ACB = \frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the length of the slope AC is ()
